Detailed Description

Singleton Collision Manager.

The collision manager resides in Level, knows about all physical entities, and monitors and resolves collisions.

Member Function Documentation

bool CollisionManager::RegisterEntity ( std::string  layerName,
PhysicalEntity *  entity 
)

Registers a physical entity into the layer 'layerName'.

Layer names are: Sprite, Wall, Exit.
